get_blockchain_pairs.description: Retrieves trading pairs from a specific blockchain
get_blockchain_pairs.use_case: Monitor and analyze trading pairs on specific blockchain networks

data.description: List of trading pairs with their details

get_blockchain_stats.description: Retrieves statistics for a specific blockchain
get_blockchain_stats.use_case: Analyze volume, liquidity, and token metrics for blockchain networks

volume_history.description: Historical volume data as [timestamp, value] pairs

liquidity_history.description: Historical liquidity data as [timestamp, value] pairs

tokens_history.description: Historical token count data as [timestamp, value] pairs

get_cefi_funding_rate.description: Retrieves funding rates from centralized exchanges
get_cefi_funding_rate.use_case: Monitor and compare funding rates across different CEX platforms

get_market_query.description: Performs a market query with various filters and sorting options
get_market_query.use_case: Search and filter market data with custom criteria

data.description: List of market data matching query criteria

get_market_query_token.use_case: Search and filter token market data with custom criteria

data.description: List of tokens matching query criteria

get_market_token_vs_market.description: Compares token performance against market metrics
get_market_token_vs_market.use_case: Analyze token performance relative to market benchmarks

tag.description: Market segment or tag to compare against

get_market_data.description: Fetches comprehensive market data for a specific cryptocurrency or token
get_market_data.use_case: Used to get current market metrics, price data, and trading information for a specific asset

get_all_assets.description: Retrieves data for all assets listed on the platform
get_all_assets.use_case: Used to get a comprehensive list of all available assets and their basic information

fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response

get_market_nft.description: Retrieves market data for NFT assets
get_market_nft.use_case: Track NFT prices and market activity

get_market_multi_data.description: Fetches market data for multiple assets in a single request
get_market_multi_data.use_case: Efficient way to monitor multiple assets simultaneously, perfect for portfolio tracking

get_market_multi_history.description: Retrieves historical market data for multiple assets
get_market_multi_history.use_case: Compare historical performance of multiple assets

data.description: Historical market data for each asset

get_market_sparkline.description: Retrieves sparkline data for market visualization
get_market_sparkline.use_case: Generate price charts and visual representations

get_market_pairs.use_case: Used to get detailed information about trading pairs including liquidity, volume, and price data

get_market_trades_pair.description: Retrieves trade history for a specific pair
get_market_trades_pair.use_case: Analyze trading activity and price movements for a trading pair

is_buy.description: True if buy, false if sell

data.description: List of trades with detailed information

get_metadata_categories.use_case: Get organized asset categories and market segments

data.description: List of categories with market data

get_wallet_transactions.description: Retrieves transaction history for a wallet
get_wallet_transactions.use_case: Track wallet activity and analyze transaction patterns

get_wallet_nfts.description: Retrieves NFTs owned by a wallet
get_wallet_nfts.use_case: Track NFT holdings and monitor NFT portfolio

get_blockchains.description: Retrieves information about all supported blockchains
get_blockchains.use_case: Get comprehensive details about blockchain networks including RPCs, contracts, and configuration

get_feed_create.use_case: Set up custom data feeds for asset tracking

get_market_history.description: Retrieves historical market data for an asset
get_market_history.use_case: Analyze price history and market trends

get_market_token_holders.use_case: Analyze token distribution and holder statistics

get_market_total.use_case: Monitor overall market metrics and trends

get_metadata.description: Retrieves detailed metadata for an asset
get_metadata.use_case: Get comprehensive asset information including social metrics and project details

get_metadata_news.description: Retrieves news articles for specified assets
get_metadata_news.use_case: Monitor news and updates for crypto assets

get_metadata_trendings.use_case: Monitor popular and trending crypto assets

get_multi_metadata.use_case: Batch fetch detailed information for multiple assets

data.description: List of metadata for multiple assets

get_wallet_portfolio.description: Retrieves complete portfolio data for wallets
get_wallet_portfolio.use_case: Track crypto portfolio and analyze holdings across chains

search.description: Search for assets, tokens, and trading pairs
search.use_case: Find specific assets or trading pairs using various search criteria
